medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The episodes of head bobbing and perioral cyanosis occurred during feedings, starting twenty days before admission. Three days prior to admission, respiratory distress with agitation or repositioning was noted. Symptoms occurred several times daily, resolving with oxygen administration and sometimes followed by long naps.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Microcephaly and developmental delay since birth; mother experienced two spontaneous miscarriages.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's maternal grandmother had a bifid uvula; otherwise, family history is unremarkable.
medical_history.social_history: The patient lives with parents and an older sibling; was receiving early-intervention services.
